N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6030.1 - Purpose and intent of Part

State Regulations

It is the purpose and intent of this Part to provide
eligible police officers with custom-fitted ballistic soft-body armor vests
capable of sustaining multiple hits from various types of commonly encountered
handgun ammunition fired from various types of commonly encountered handguns, including but not limited to any firearm or firearms considered by an applicant
to be standard issue for its police officers, with the ability to disperse
deliverable shock in such a manner as to protect the wearer from extreme shock
injury. It is the further intent of this Part to adopt specifications for such
vests that permit the selection of vests that are comfortable to wear
throughout an entire eight-hour shift, thereby encouraging police officers to
wear them at all times while on duty. Notes
